DOC.brief_title: Patient-reported Outcome Questionnaire Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct three stage . Stages I II complete . Participation Stage III require completion online survey . The survey may access follow link : http : //www.surveymonkey.com/s/mbc3survey Compensation option eligible participant list end survey . Eligibility confirm follow-up call/email study staff .
DOC.criteria: Female Age 18 old Clinical diagnosis metastatic breast cancer U.S. resident Able speak read English Willing sign inform consent Willing selfadminister one online questionnaire take approximately 15 minute complete
